website_summaries.verdict: This eye-catching "unicorn" wig comes in on-trend pastel colors and is extremely inexpensive.
pros: Stands out for its long, blunt bangs
Bangs can be styled across the forehead or swept to one side
Comes with built-in adjustable wig cap to help get a good fit
Fibers are shiny but not unrealistically so
cons: Isn't the highest quality option, but fine for occasional cosplay or fancy dress parties

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like the model but does have the same colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Grey/Greeb Diamond. Doesn't look like the model but does have the same colors. Still a great wig. You can style it straight in extremely low heat. I purchased the light rainbow-pastel too. (That one is the main wig.) It looks exact/close to the model. Still great in photography but I haven't worn in public yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This wig was amazing! I used it for a water elf body painting piece that I did and it worked so perfectly. It was great quality, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a colorful, fun wig!
customer_reviews.author: Nicho

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wig purchase. I was a little uneasy but after reading all the reviews I can attest I AGREE! She feels like hay and some wefts can be seen BUT if properly styled and brushed she will be baby soft and yummy to look at :D I spent about 6 hours trimming, cutting, brushing, combing and styling but the finished product is gorgeoussssss She came in 2 days (FREE) and with a stocking cap plus adjustable straps! I'm a very happy princess now!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hallstead

customer_reviews.title: First wig. Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: My first wig. But I think I made a very good choice! I wear it for every day use. I have lower back length hair so I braid and tuck. The waves conceal the little bump my hair creates and the wig stays on very well. It's a little shorter than I anticipated but the curls will loosen with time and taming.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Beck

customer_reviews.title: Rose Red/ Grey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on Dec. 27 and it got here Jan. 15. I love it, it's very soft, very curly, and it looks exactly like the picture. It was however hard to get on, I guess my head is too big and looks very skinny with flash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pink side...
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely a lil bit shinier than I would want.. but luckily there are ways to fix that. The hair is soft, and doesn’t shed as badly as other wigs I have (some even being more $). The only problem I really have is there isn’t enough hair on the pink side, so you can see the tracks in the back and I couldn’t style it to hide them. The white side is thick enough, but to be able to wear this out.. I’ll have to do something w the pink side or wear a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cute wig and colors
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first time ever wearing a wig and for this price it was pretty good! The colors were so pretty and I got a lot of compliments on the color and cuteness of it. Down side was that it was slipping backwards towards the end of the night. Funnily, it stayed on better when I put it on without the net. I don’t think this wig will be good for thicker hair coz it’s a very thin wig. I was wearing a hoodie over the wig so you couldn’t really see how thin it was on top. But other than that, this is definitely a bang for your buck sorta wig and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Lua

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute!!! Worn this one out and about. Its thick enough that none of the cap shows. One of my favorites. Will buy again. :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Atrocious quality
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this wig - the colors and designs are lovely. However, I wonder if I got a flawed one-off? The straps inside are not secured through the loops as they should be, most of the size adjustment ribbon is sewed right into the cap so I can't actually size it appropriately, and so much of the hair fell out almost immediately. It never stops shedding; there's no way for me to wear it without huge portions of the wig cap showing through. :/ Take your chances, be prepared for a possible one-time-only or careful photo shoot to hide the wig's poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Pastel Gradient wig out there!
customer_reviews.text: It's really difficult to find a wig with a really nice combo of colors and even harder to find colors that have a more natural looking gradient(even if they are pastels!) This is by far my favorite wig. My only issue is the wig cap needs to be improved. There's really no "cling" to it even if you use the elastic sizing bands. It felt like the wig cap doesn't really fit the shape of your head fully. If it fit better I would have given this a 5 star, otherwise the pastel wig is awesome and I always get tons of compliments <3
customer_reviews.author: Le Pan

customer_reviews.title: Good for TikTok's, but not for everyday use or a con of any sort!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the coloring was AMAZING! But, I was looking at it on my wig stand and I realized there were about 4-5 HUGE bald spots in the wig at the back! Not only that but it also had the bangs extremely messed up, what I mean by that is at the top it looked like somebody had cut half of them off. The heat resistance was actual garbage in my opinion, wore it for 10 minutes in a nice air conditioned room (about 80 degrees Fahrenheit) and almost got a heat stroke! This wig is good for TikTok videos, but I wouldn't recommend for everyday use or a con of any sort.
customer_reviews.author: Kamochu Pierick

customer_reviews.title: Great Wigs Fast Shipping Had to Cut Brown Bangs
customer_reviews.text: I really like the blue/green one better... This one the bangs were really long so I had to cut them. And I think the blue/green looks better with my skin. Good quality tho arrived in 1 day and came with head net which makes putting the wig on easier. I posted before cutting bangs and after cutting bangs of the brown one and the blue one was not cut. I also put a picture of my "natural state" lol
customer_reviews.author: AliciaV

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a possible Halloween outfit, as well as a costume piece for a musical. It is beautiful and soft! Fits very comfortably and looks great on. Only wore it for Halloween but got lots of compliments on it. Stores nicely in the bag and net it came in. Can’t wait to wear it again. EDIT: Wore this for a cosplay convention. Wore it for almost 15 hours and it was super comfortable and still looked great at the end of the long day. Had lots of compliments on the color and look of it.
customer_reviews.author: nyd1623

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft wig!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is absolutely stunning! It is the first wig I have ever purchased and I was very nervous to purchase this one online, but did so anyway and I’m so glad! I received so many compliments! I cannot speak to its heat resistance as haven’t tried to use any heat tools on this wig. But I can certainly see myself reprising my role as a unicorn as often as possible so I can wear this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Tissan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great $15 Wig!
customer_reviews.text: This is everything a $15 wig should be. Heat resistant fibers, looks like the picture, skin top for the centered part. From experience, I know that it will start to look dry, brittle, and cheap after fewer than 10 uses, but that's what you get at this price point. If you want a nicer/more comfortable cap, longer lasting fibers, lace front, built in combs, etc look at the $30-$60 range. I definitely recommend this wig for costumes (much nicer than any $20+ wig you'll get at a halloween or party store), filling in other wigs, or anyone looking to try out wigs before dropping a lot of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Sanders7089

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Super great product!!! It came within a week and wasn’t damaged or even a hair out of place. The hair is super soft and stylable (I’ve separated segments to put in the front, and it’s pretty easy to put into a low ponytail. Not sure about higher hairstyles though.) and it’s as long as the pictures make it seem. A tighter hairnet might be needed for people with longer hair, though, since the one that comes with it is pretty loose and big. It’s usually not a problem if you pull your hair back anyway. I had to cut a little bit of the bangs since the parting was a bit weird, other than that it was a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Iury Ruu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This wig was the worst wig of all times I literally had it on for 30 minutes and it Got so nappy and Tangled I spent my whole day brushing it. It was not worth the money don't waste your time. PS I made the wig look good don't let the picture for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to give this a poor review because the color is beautiful and if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first wig. Never tried one before this one, not even for Halloween. I wasn't sure what to expect. I don't want to give this a poor review because the color is beautiful and if you know what you're expecting, this could be great. I really don't like how much is sheds and unsure if that's normal with these type of wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Very... Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Monomi cosplay from Danganronpa. If I could have chosen another wig, I would have. But this was literally the only affordable one I could find. It's more pink than white, even though it's supposed to be more half and half, the hair is really itchy and lays flat and refuses to puff up or hold decent shape. The back was also so thin, you could see my hair right through it. I have really dark hair and it just did nothing to hide it. Luckily, my cosplay involved a hood so the whole back-half of the wig was covered. It worked for what I needed, but I plan on hunting down a new wig ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Tangled easily.
customer_reviews.text: Decent wig, used it for a Halloween costume. The only issue was it was difficult to style it to keep the bangs out of my face. The wanted to hang right down straight in the front. The other issue was that it tangled up quickly. I brushed it out before leaving for the night and within an hour it was all tangled like a rats nest, and I was not flipping it around of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews mentioned the bangs were not satisfactory, but mine are good! They're long enough for me to sweep them to the side or leave them straight down. They are not too short at all and don't have a blunt straight-across cut....This is a pretty soft wig. So much better than the plastic-like ones I have used in the past for costumes. My only complaint is that if I pull some hair forward over my shoulders, then there is not a lot of hair left in the back. The color is really pretty and the price was too good not to try it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWomann

customer_reviews.title: very soft with long bangs
customer_reviews.text: i got the pink and blonde wig and it's super soft, especially the blonde part! usually after a day of wear, even my more expensive wigs get tangled and messy, but this one held up to being tied up in a pony tail, taken on and off a few times and a trip to a diner. it's pretty easy to brush if you have the right brushes and combs, and as long as it's brushed regularly it stays soft and nice. my only complaint is that the bangs cover most of my face, but they're so long that a bit of trimming should hopefully fix it ^^
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great wig
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this wig is perfect. The bangs are very long so I cut mine the way I like them but it holds up well and actually comes with a wig cap unlike many other. I’d recommend it for sure. My bf loves it
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: The color is amazing in person
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing in person and the bangs were perfect the only downfall is the upkeep it loses curl quite easy and Tangles even easier when you use a comb to brush it out it doesn't stay soft it becomes frayed and dried out looking but the color makes up for it you don't have to wear a hat when you wear it because it does look realistic I get compliments every time I wear it just takes a lot to keep it intact and realistic-looking you really have to take care of it every time you take it off
customer_reviews.author: Heather Clemments

customer_reviews.title: Its Comfortable And Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig! Its comfortable to wear and the colors are vibrant! Its not heavy and it fits great! Its not going anywhere! It is super soft! I haven't tried yo use any heat to curl or strighten the wig yet but overall I highly recommend it and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and fun
customer_reviews.text: A great wig to have fun in. A few people even asked me where I got my epic dye job! Depending on how you style it, you can really pull off real hair. My only complaint is that the "Shirley Temple" curls (green part) are so ingrained in that even when I wash or try to break them up, they keep that "too perfect to be real" look. I guess being too perfect could be a good thing though XD
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not a Lot to Work With
customer_reviews.text: The colour is great but the rooting job and rooting placement/amount of hair rooting isn't the best. Scraggly and thin in a few places such as the back, but it's good if you're either just looking for a Halloween costume wig, looking for a cheap wig to customise or practice with, or just to feel cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lí

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and silky good quality over all
customer_reviews.text: THIS WIG IS AMAZING I LOVE IT SO MUCH OMFg. If your going to a con this wig is so comfortable. Also it’s really silky and good quality one of the better wigs I’ve gotten like holy shoot. Aaaaaaa. Definitely recommend this one especially for a monomi eeee
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Monomi Cosplay
customer_reviews.text: this wig was amazing! the wig was great for my monomi cosplay, i used a separate curly white clip on the white side to add more floor to that side! over all amazing!
customer_reviews.author: coffincandy_cos

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, the hair kinda looks fake, in the back it has less hair (if they could fix that, these would be killer) but from afar people thought it was my actual hair. It’s definitely fun to wear :) I know there’s something you can do that can make it look more real. But I’m happy with the purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great shake and go!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible wig for the price. The colors are correct to the picture. I have a giant head and this fit perfectly. There are straps that you can use for a snugger fit. The hair isn't shiny plastic, so with a quick shake and a gentle brush this looks pretty good. I also liked that this came with a wig cap. I will defiantly use this for future Halloween costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Farley

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful! Like really
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! Like really. Really beautiful. But in the hands of an 8 year old it gets tangled SO fast. So for instance. If it’s for Halloween. Don’t open it until it’s going to be used. Because if they have it for a week prior it will be a mess. Definitely awesome for one use. It can be used for more than one use but it just won’t look perfect for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 Wife of 1

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I am not normally a wig person and bought this to teach my daughter how to care for her long hair herself but this is quite beautiful and falls very naturally. The colors are soft and not at all brassy. The texture is also soft and nice. It comes with caps which was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenrenee

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Wig!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors, easy to put on, came packaged well. This is my 3rd or 4th purchase of these wigs. I just them just for fun. This one in particular is really soft and I can brush the tangles out with ease after I wear it. Will purchase more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Noel Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute - But Tracks ALWAYS Visable
customer_reviews.text: This wig is pretty cute! It is pretty shiny under some lights. Be advised - the wig is thin, so the the cap is pretty much ALWAYS visible in the back. It's a cheap wig though so I didn't really expect any different. Like other reviewers, I wear it with a beanie and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: rkathman

customer_reviews.title: and some said it was dull. I need this product as soon as possible ...
customer_reviews.text: When i first ordered this product, i looked at many reviews. Some said it was thin, and some said it was dull. I need this product as soon as possible so i emailed the seller, and OMG! They were really nice and the product came in a VERY REASONABLE TIME! I ordered this product at the end of October and it was at my door step by the beginning of November! When i tried it on, IT WAS PERFECT! It has a nice VIBRATE COLOR and it is NOT THIN. The cap fit my head just right, and the product does not sled that much. I LOVE EVERYTHING about this product and i would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great with a hat.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wig. It's pretty, and when you throw a beanie over it, people can't even tell the hair isn't real. I knocked off a star because I received a wig that was thin at the top, so wearing it without a beanie or hat is not an option. However, I knew that was a high probability before I purchased the wig thanks to reading the other reviews, so I wasn't really upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thin but I fluffed it out and it worked for me well. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Moongypsy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specific color wig for a Deadmau5 concert and I got lots of compliments. It's been 3 months as I've been continuing to wear this and the compliments keeps on coming, which makes me happy. Only thing that sucks is that I may need to wear a hat because the netting kind of shows on the back at the top of the wig. Idk if its just me or the wig itself. Pretty wig nonetheless, will purchase more colors in the future
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I liked it, but I without clipping bangs aside I looked weird. Bangs were to long for me, so the wig would not stay still with constant fixing hair off my face. Clipped front hair worked well, but with better bangs I would use this product more.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: DUDE.  This wig rules.
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite wigs ever, hands down. Didn't come in the fancy bag, but whatevz. It's very adjustable for different head sizes, mine has brilliant colors, and the curls are great. People often think that it's my real hair, even knowing that I rock wigs often. As "unnatural" as it is, it looks surprisingly real. And so dang cheap! Stop thinking about it, just get this wig.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter Dun

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS WIG! THIS WIG IS IT! i live in new orleans and im always looking for wigs for halloween/mardi gras and this wig is it wow. I just tried it on and i can honestly say its better than any other ive ever purchased. looks exactly like the picture, comes with wig cap and the hair stays in place (no fly aways) AND THE PRICE. if youre on the fence about getting this wig i would get it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors aren't accurate
customer_reviews.text: Quality wise you get what you pay for. What I'm upset about is the colors not being true. Ordered this for st Patty's day. Says two different color greens, one of the colors is blue, nothing green about it. Dont really know that it will serve it's intended purpose. Might keep it for Mardi Gras but disappointed another wont come in time for our Chicago trip next weekend without paying shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I got this wig for a cosplay and it works amazing . I also did a photoshoot for a bathing suit look and my photographer even complimented it. I've never had a problem with map of beauty wigs and I intend to order from them for years!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you cant go wrong with this wig. The colors look good, its soft, and there is enough hair so that it is full coverage, you vant see the underliner. It does tangle very easy though...
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used with tangles!
customer_reviews.text: Used! Arrived with hair net out of package (see photo) AND tangles. How gross! I am going to keep it because I am never going to wear it! I bought it to use on a mannequin. But truly this is terrible that I would receive a used item. But I will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Usr

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rose red/black brownish. It looks like two wigs put together. The top is a straight brown bob while under is a wavy red. (Not even the right shade of red) It's a confused mess. Extremely disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: U get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: It is a great wig when you are in a pinch! I needed a wig last minute and this one definitely does the job, you get what you pay for because it’s not the most high quality wig but I would recommend if you just need something quick
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hong

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste $$. Sheds by clumps. Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: It SHEDs in patches! Literally have had it for an hour, ran my fingers through it and already have a softball size climb of hair. At this rate it’s going to be bald by the end of the day. It’s crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica yam

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the high quality
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the quality on this wig. I bought it or my daughter for her unicorn Halloween costume. It's so beautiful and full. Beautiful color, and falls like real hair.
customer_reviews.author: MazzyStar

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cheap wig but it that’s what you get for the price. The color was the only good part didn’t look at all like the picture was gonna cut and fix it but to bad to even fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: For when you want sexy green hair but all the salons are closed
customer_reviews.text: Getting this dye job would be too complicated for me, and would require a professional. Instead, I opted for this wig. Great for the price, photographs well. Looks less great in sunlight, but that's to be expected from synthetic wigs at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Callmecarebear

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible. I honestly threw it in the trash immediately
customer_reviews.text: This is the thinnest wig I’ve EVER purchased from amazon. Just horrible. I honestly threw it in the trash immediately. The wig cap felt uncomfortable and baggy in such a weird way. Plus again, it was so thin that the hair barely covered the weird wig cap.... just overall this wig was a hot mess. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone. Not even for a one night out type deal. Just skip out on this one. Not sure how everyone else finds this suitable? Maybe it differs between colors
customer_reviews.author: Strawbunnies

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wig
customer_reviews.text: Great wig, ordered for my kid for Halloween she was a hot pink shopkin and this really went with the costume well, the color was very vibrant, it stayed on due to the nice clip adjuster in the inside, one downside is it does get tangled and it’s kind of hard to brush out once this happens but other than that was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ClaireB

customer_reviews.title: Well made, gorgeous wig
customer_reviews.text: I’m always skeptical of wigs because they just don’t normally stay on easily or they’re too thin and you can see your hair underneath. However I’m so happy with my purchase, I got it for a unicorn Halloween costume and I honestly heard how “magical” I looked the whole night. It looked great and wasn’t annoying to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great costume piece
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for halloween! It stayed in place all day, didn't tangle and maintained it's shape/curl throughout the day. I think this is best used as a 1-2 use wig as it's not one that can be easily combed/brushed.
customer_reviews.author: I & S. Stark

customer_reviews.title: I love tangle but not in my wigs
customer_reviews.text: Cute, Comfy but boy does it tangle alot. I got so many compliments over Christmas for this brown green wig. The colors blend together magnificently. It's a real eye catcher. But the hair tangles really easy which can cause some issues.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fullness. It shedded a very little but nothing crazy but I do love how soft & how realistic it looks! Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & ToniRae Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bachelorette
customer_reviews.text: I went to a bachelorette with a wig night. This fit my long hair under it perfectly and allowed me to still participate. It is cute and cheap for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I know I can't expect too much ordering wings off of Amazon, but I had had positive experiences before and figured why not try again. While the coloring of this wig is beautiful, the cut is wonky as heck and it won't sit on my head right. I'm gonna have to go in and adjust the cut myself at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: It works really great when worn correctly
customer_reviews.text: The contrast of the blue to the other colors is much more noticeable in person, though when I have worn this wig with a hat, no one has been able to tell that it is not my real hair. It works really great when worn correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wig for my bachelorette party. It was fun and the colors are beautiful. The hair is good quality, and not too shiny like other inexpensive wigs. My only "complaints" is that the bangs were a bit awkward and had to be restyled quite a bit. Also, the back is a bit thin, but my blonde hair helped fill in the blank spaces ok. Overall, I would totally recommend this wig for a fun occasion or costume!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Trash BABY DOLL HAIR JUST TRASH AND I PUT IT IN THE TRASH
customer_reviews.text: TRASH TRASH IDC ABOUT IT WAS CHEAP I HAVE GOTTEN WIGS ON HERE BEFORE CHEAP AND LOVE THEM I GOTTEN ONE FOR 3.99 BEFORE AND LOVE IT BUT I WILL NOT WALK AROUND LOOKING CRAZY WITH A WIG THAT IS LIKE BABY DOLL HAIR
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Party wig is well made and whimsically pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This wig is actually we put together. It does not shed and stays unmatted when its brushed out. My granddaughter wore it while dressed as a mermaid for Halloween. The perfect accessory for her costume!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Mom tried it on also and had fun with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 5 year olds mermaid costume. Very lush and full. Loves it. Mom tried it on also and had fun with it. Fits all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: georgann vohsen

customer_reviews.title: Used instead of new
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I got a used one. It came out of the bag very tangled. I've never had that problem with new wings. If that wasn't the case, I'd tell you it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle D

customer_reviews.title: The bangs cannot be tamed
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this wig, but the bangs just are unmanageable even with clips. I did keep the wig, but wish the bangs were easier to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Rae D

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: All in all, for the price this wig is ok. HOWEVER: I ordered this wig for everyday use, as I have really short hair, and I prefer fun colors on me and miss my long length. This wig is true to color and is really good in terms of length, but I was not happy with the amount of shedding this wig has, strands are constantly falling out. Also, it is rather thin and you can visibly see the wig cap and such through the hair. I recommend wearing a beanie with this wig. All in all, it isn't a terrible wig, I recommend it for costume parties and cosplay. It is not ideal for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but pretty wig
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wig. Tracks are pretty visible and bright white. Top hair is very shiny. But looks great, lots of compliments. Easy enough to hide the tracks, cut, and style. Colors are beautiful. For $10 it is a fantastic wig.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Wig over all!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great wig! it feels nice and holds its shape well overtime! enough hair to cover all the mesh parts. great for monomi cosplayers and great for other cosplays as well! would over all recommend :D Cons: Hair is pretty thin, meaning you can basically see through the mess and you could see your wig cap. Hair does potentially fall out over time, but I think that is pretty normal. Does melt! keep your straightener or curler on low!
customer_reviews.author: pastelpinkmocha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and fairly comfortable (I am a novice). I just need to trim the bangs to fit my face but I expected to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It's a wig!
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent wig for the price but still a bit cheap. It sheds and looks pretty plastic but for the price still not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Fish Frog

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wig. Looks pretty natural and fits on the head well. The bangs are a little fake looking in my opinion, but that's a minor complaint. For the price you really can't beat this wig!
customer_reviews.author: Cross

customer_reviews.title: huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Wig i have ever owned! i’m obsessed!!! absolutely gorgeous! The color is out of this world brilliant! it’s soft and full too! does tangle a bit easy , at least the one i have does! all in all a huge huge fan! hands down will be buying more , i’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: It was ok and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 10yo daughter, she loves it and it looks good. Not to cheap looking, not too amazing neither (just like the picture.) It gets messy easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby H.

customer_reviews.title: Really soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great wig. Especially for the price. I got it as a gift for someone else but I took it out of its packaging for quality check lol. It's really soft!! I have no idea how heat resistant it is, though. It also has adjusters on the inside part to adjust to your head.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and colorful wig! I ordered this for a Photoshoot and it did not disappoint! I had so many compliments and many thought it was my real hair! For the price it is a great buy! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanyrosexartistry

customer_reviews.title: Great wig
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing a wig, I honestly didn’t understand how to put it on correctly. I just threw it on my head and put a hoodie on. Used it for trick or treating with my daughters. I don’t see myself using it again, but definitely great for a 1 time thing
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Got one for my friend for her birthday and then all my friends and I decided we need fun wigs! Not the highest quality necessarily but definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: This wig is sooo fab! Got one for my friend for her birthday and then all my friends and I decided we need fun wigs! Not the highest quality necessarily but definitely appropriate for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect style and color
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a flawless blend of color however the product I received is far from that. It has 2 solid lengths so looks like a long mullet cut as opposed to a layered cut. The color is also wrong as I ordered a light to dark brown and received a brown to red. Ironically the quality of the wig hair and cap are nice but I will now need to order a second in the correct color and style from another seller and pay to have this one cut in the hopes that I can salvage my money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I order all my wigs from MapofBeauty and this was just as nice as expected. As always, there is some shedding, but most Amazon wigs do, so I'm not disappointed in the slightest. This wig is VERY soft and comfortable to wear. This is definitely the prettiest wig I own, also.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Nance

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Look like the Picture.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when i got this wig only to be mad when i opened it. It looks nothing like the picture. It's supposed to be green/brown (in the pic it looks more green and #2 black). I open it and it look like green and gray. It's this ashy looking gray that doesn't look great with the green so i was so mad because it looked amazing in the picture. I'm not gonna buy anything else from this buyer.
customer_reviews.author: keya laney

customer_reviews.title: True to picture
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so pretty and the fullness & softness of the wig are incredible definitely recommended (Use for my 6yr old unicorn costume)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: very soft and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for halloween and my daughter loves it! It's soft and pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: TresBien

customer_reviews.title: Hot head
customer_reviews.text: I wore this during Pride and it was great! Like pretty much every wig, it does retain heat. It's nowhere near super high quality wigs, but it is definitely a couple steps in front of a cheap Party City wig.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting something amazing to be honest but this was a really good fit. This is my first ever wig and I'm glad I got it. It's really pretty. I can't wait to wear it more.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! So soft and nice. Doesn't lay quite right but I think a little brushing will help that. Came with wig cap and the wig itself is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Jescey Olive

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: This wig has such a gorgeous color and i ALWAYS get compliments when i wear it. However, the hair isn’t laid very well so you can see the wig cap. The hair is sparse and tangled it you look at it too long lol. It also sheds very badly. Probably the worst quality wig I’ve ever had but the color is so gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: Really gorgeous long wig! I got the cotton candy colored one for a unicorn costume. Compliments all night :) It is fairly thick, adjustable (little hooks on the inside) and i didn’t notice a lot of hair falling out. It feels really pretty on. In this pic it’s a bit wind blown and still looks fab!
customer_reviews.author: marisa jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous and the curls are beautiful. it's a bit thin but for the price, i can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as long as description or pic
customer_reviews.text: The description says it is 28” long, however I received it today and it is only 21 inches from the very top at the part of the wig. Very disappointed in the drastic 7 inch difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy H

customer_reviews.title: such a fun wig
customer_reviews.text: this wig is so perfect!!!!! i love it, the only reason i give it 4 instead of 5, is because you do see tracks in the crown,i wish it was slightly thicker, so if you will be wearing a hat, or are not attempting to pass this off as your own hair, you will LOVE IT! it doesn't shed to bad or tangle much either, i highly recommend for any costume or fun night out!
customer_reviews.author: Indi, FIT INDICA, INDICA RENEGADE...

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL WIG
customer_reviews.text: Bought many wigs before but this one exceeded standard. Good price and feels light, beautiful and went past my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much!!! Really amazing quality for price. It’s a little tight (the wig cap is) but I’m sure it’ll stretch out with more use. The bangs are perfect and work well for a side swept look
customer_reviews.author: Anna P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig. Shipped faster than expected, came with a wig cap and is good quality. The wig came out of the package immediately wearable. The wig cap works well and the wig itself is as comfortable as wearing a wig can be. Bought this as a second fun wig after buying another for my Halloween costume. I've worn this in public and receive compliments on it. Great quality for the price and one of the only times I feel I got more than I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana K

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and especially at the price. I put it on to see how it looks but didn’t set it etc so it will look even better when I do. It does shed a bit yet for the price, its a great value. Keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: KELLY OLEARY

customer_reviews.title: Starfire
customer_reviews.text: I got this wig for a Starfire cosplay and I am so happy with it!!!! This was a steal for the price. The wig came nicely packed with a wig cap and I love the loose curls. Would recommend, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: multiple color wig
customer_reviews.text: Big Hit for 9 year old Great Niece - loves to play dress up 😉
customer_reviews.author: just Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Feel like a party city wig I guess the price its ok, with some help you can make it worj
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Fenty

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday for my sister for who does alot of Comi-Cons. I tried it on out of curiosity and I was surprised at how comfortable and soft it was. I'm a licensed hairstylist so I'm gonna texture the bangs so they aren't so blunt for her
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Harris

product_meta.title: MapofBeauty 28" Wavy Multi-Color Lolita Cosplay Wig Party Wig (Light Blue/Light Purple/Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:Light Blue/ Light Purple/ Pink1.Our wig product is made of Kanekalon fiber which is a thermostable Material and called "High-temperature resistance fiber". it can be curled or straightened by Electronic Hair stick under 120 degrees Celsius. Generally, The suitable temperature is around 70-90 degrees Celsius. in additional, please pay attention to High temperature when you curl or straighten Hair because it will do harm for Hair. 

2.Our wig product is not available for dyeing. Because there is no Hair squama to keep The Color for a Long Time and Hair cream rinses can't be washed inside The wig Cap. 

3.wig Wearing Steps: 
a.comb gently With specialized comb (excluded Curly wig); 
b.Fix The wig Cap by The Buckle; 
c.spray wig care solution and Style Wigs Hair in your favor. 

4.wig Clean and care: First wig straightened out, put a little shampoo in cold Water, and then The wig into The Water and soak for 5-10 minutes, gently Press wash, then rinse well With Water, dry With a towel after Water dry naturally, can spray a little point of care solution. 

5.The irresistible factors including Computer Monitors, Shooting Light, Camera Pixels and personal understanding of Color Difference will be caused Color difference sometimes.
feature_bullets: Wig Cap Size: The maximum circumference Approx 20~21inch/51~53cm(Exist 1~2cm normal error), the size of wig cap is adjustable
